story_text: The bright light from the night sky made the birds fly high.
A tiny knight waved goodbye with a big smile as he saw the kite in flight.
story_images: An illustration of a night sky with bright stars and birds flying high.
A small knight waving goodbye with a big smile while a colorful kite flies in the sky.

questions.question: What made the birds fly high?
What did the knight see in flight?
